alert.note: Alert for Craig; Nowata (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:14AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Craig, northeastern Rogers, northern Mayes and eastern Nowata Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 214 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from South Coffeyville to near Chelsea. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Vinita... Chelsea... Langley... South Coffeyville... Welch... Ketchum... Bluejacket... Disney... Lenapah... Big Cabin... New Alluwe... Cherokee State Park... White Oak... Hollow... Centrailia... Disney Little Blue State Park... Pyramid Corners... Centralia... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 269 and 292. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma.
